summary: An affair is almost exposed when Claire's husband unexpectedly returns early from Summer Olympics.
cast: Lili Damita|Charles Ruggles|Roland Young|Thelma Todd|Cary Grant|Irving Bacon|Davison Clark|Gino Corrado|Claire Dodd|Alex Melesh|Donald Novis|Tiny Sandford|Rolfe Sedan|Harry Semels
title: Esta es la noche
